org.cxio.core

Class CxWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cxio.core.CxWriter

  • public class CxWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for writing aspect fragments (lists of aspects).
    Author:
    cmzmasek

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static final CxWriter createInstance(java.io.OutputStream out)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a CxWriter for reading from OutputStream out.
        Subsequent calls to method addAspectFragmentWriter(AspectFragmentWriter writer) are required to add AspectFragmentWriter to the newly created CxWriter.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to read
        Returns:
        a CxWriter writer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createInstance

        public static final CxWriter createInstance(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                            boolean use_default_pretty_printer)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a CxWriter for reading from OutputStream out.
        Subsequent calls to method addAspectFragmentWriter(AspectFragmentWriter writer) are required to add AspectFragmentWriter to the newly created CxWriter.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to read
        use_default_pretty_printer - to turn pretty printing on/off
        Returns:
        a CxWriter writer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createInstance

        public static final CxWriter createInstance(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                            boolean use_default_pretty_printer,
                                            boolean calculate_md5_checksum)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Returns a CxWriter for reading from OutputStream out.
        Subsequent calls to method addAspectFragmentWriter(AspectFragmentWriter writer) are required to add AspectFragmentWriter to the newly created CxWriter.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to read
        use_default_pretty_printer - to turn pretty printing on/off
        calculate_md5_checksum - to turn MD5 checksum calculation on/off
        Returns:
        a CxWriter writer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

                                               boolean use_default_pretty_printer)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a CxWriter for reading from OutputStream out with AspectFragmentWriters for nodes, edges, and cartesian layout elements already added.

      • createInstanceNEC

        public static final CxWriter createInstanceNEC(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                               boolean use_default_pretty_printer,
                                               boolean calculate_md5_checksum,
                                               java.util.Set<AspectFragmentWriter> aspect_writers)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Returns a CxWriter for reading from OutputStream out with AspectFragmentWriters for nodes, edges, and cartesian layout elements already added.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to read
        use_default_pretty_printer - to turn pretty printing on/off
        calculate_md5_checksum - to turn MD5 checksum calculation on/off
        aspect_writers - the (additional) set of AspectFragmentWriter to use
        Returns:
        a CxWriter writer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

        public static final CxWriter createInstanceWithAllAvailableWriters(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                                                   boolean use_default_pretty_printer,
                                                                   boolean calculate_md5_checksum)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a CxWriter for reading from OutputStream out with all AspectFragmentWriters implemented in this library already added.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to read
        use_default_pretty_printer - to turn pretty printing on/off

      • startAspectFragment

        public void startAspectFragment(java.lang.String aspect_name)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This method is to be called prior to writing individual aspect elements of a given type/name.
        Parameters:
        aspect_name - the name of the aspect elements to be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                       throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

         throws java.io.IOException

           throws java.io.IOException

      • writeAspectElements

        public void writeAspectElements(java.util.List<AspectElement> elements)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This is for writing a list of AspectElements (a aspect fragment) of a given type.
        A appropriate AspectFragmentWriter will be automatically selected (if added previously).
        Parameters:
        elements - the list of AspectElements to be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeAspectElements

        public void writeAspectElements(java.util.List<AspectElement> elements,
                                AspectFragmentWriter writer)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This is for writing a list of AspectElements (a aspect fragment) of a given type.
        Parameters:
        elements - the list of AspectElements to be written
        writer - a appropriate AspectFragmentWriter
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeAspectElement

        public void writeAspectElement(AspectElement element)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This is for writing a single AspectElement. A appropriate AspectFragmentWriter will be automatically selected (if added previously).
        Prior to calling this method for a AspectElement of a given type/name, startAspectFragment(String aspect_name) needs to be called.
        After all AspectElements of a given type/name a written, endAspectFragment() needs to be called.
        Parameters:
        element - the AspectElements to be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeAspectElement

        public void writeAspectElement(AspectElement element,
                               AspectFragmentWriter writer)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This is for writing a single AspectElement.
        Prior to calling this method for a AspectElement of a given type/name, startAspectFragment(String aspect_name) needs to be called.
        After all AspectElements of a given type/name a written, endAspectFragment() needs to be called.
        Parameters:
        element - the AspectElements to be written
        writer - a appropriate AspectFragmentWriter
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeAnonymousAspectElementAsList
